Asia Coffee-Vietnam premiums dip in quiet market

(10-5-2017) Guinea-Bissau President bans cashew sales amid smuggling

Guinea Bissau tạm ngưng bán điều thô do tình hình bán lậu qua biên giới với Senegal.

Asia Coffee-Markets quiet; premiums edge lower in Vietnam

Vietnamese robusta coffee export price quoted higher

Vietnamese robusta coffee prices fall to four-month low, trade at standstill-VnExpress

Vietnamese, Indonesian coffee prices fall – Reuters

Vietnam’s March coffee exports dip but global prices may ease on ample stocks

Vietnam, the world’s second largest coffee producer after Brazil, exported 168,000 tons (2.8 million bags) of the commodity in March, down nearly 7 percent on-year, a significant reversal from a 32-percent jump during the same period in 2016, based on government data released on Monday.

Asia Coffee-Vietnam market quiet; brisk trade in Indonesia on high supply

“There was mostly domestic trade while export activity was slow,” said independent analyst Nguyen Quang Binh, adding that foreign importers were reluctant to buy as they have abundant stocks.
